MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL18 postcode area of Rhyl, affecting properties in Dyserth Road, Bryn LLys and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.01AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because further network investigations are required on a suspected faulty piece of equipment . Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.19PM on 3rd February 2021.
